\begin{pspicture}(0,-1)(9.6,6)

	% Axis labels.
	\uput[l]{90}(-1.0,3.6){Bandwidth (TB/s)}
	\uput[d](4.8,-0.6){Spacing (KB)}

	\psset{xunit=0.02cm,yunit=4}  % Rescale to fit the data.
	\psaxes[Dx=64,Dy=0.25,tickstyle=top](512,1.5001)  % Axes.

	% Plot the points as well as the lines.
	\psset{showpoints=true}

	% Write bandwidth.
	\uput[u](256,0.696){\textcolor{lightgray}{write}}
	\listplot[linecolor=lightgray]{
		32      0.278
		64      0.433
		96      0.527
		128     0.584
		160     0.625
		192     0.656
		224     0.678
		256     0.696
		288     0.665
		320     0.226
		352     0.216
		384     0.218
		416     0.215
		448     0.216
		480     0.216
		512     0.214
	}

	% Read bandwidth.
	\uput[u](352,0.646){\textcolor{gray}{read}}
	\listplot[linecolor=gray]{
		32      0.212
		64      0.339
		96      0.420
		128     0.478
		160     0.521
		192     0.550
		224     0.578
		256     0.594
		288     0.616
		320     0.633
		352     0.646
		384     0.411
		416     0.270
		448     0.261
		480     0.259
		512     0.260
	}

	% Read+write bandwidth.
	\uput[u](288,1.197){\textcolor{black}{read-write}}
	\listplot[linecolor=black]{
		32      0.424
		64      0.671
		96      0.827
		128     0.948
		160     1.037
		192     1.088
		224     1.153
		256     1.194
		288     1.197
		320     0.473
		352     0.454
		384     0.269
		416     0.230
		448     0.226
		480     0.224
		512     0.224
	}

\end{pspicture}
